name: todo-list
description: Simple ToDo list app: organise your tasks and create projects. Live: WIP # Overview This project is made with aim of practicing using solid principles, separate DOM and app logic, using webpack. # Problem Build a ToDo list app, user can add tasks, make new projects, set task date and priority, delete and edit tasks.  # Status Started 25.04.24 Finished WIP # Conclusion I learned:  WIP
